p: In STZ-induced T2DM mice, the renoprotective nature of Momordica saponins is exerted by improving the level of uric acid and creatinine, while MCP functions mainly through enhancing antioxidant capacity [ 43]. It is also illustrated that MCP inhibits the exacerbation of diabetic nephropathy by suppressing oxidative stress and regulating HO-1/Nrf2 pathway in STZ-induced diabetic rats [ 81]. MC extract administration prolongs diabetic nephropathy via protecting kidneys from oxidative damage [ 115]. On the other hand, bitter gourd feeding controls kidney complications by means of countering the increase in the components of glycoconjugates and the decrease in kidney heparan sulfate during diabetes [ 116]. Another study observes that MC extract mitigates the apoptosis of retinal ganglion cells in T2DM rats by downregulating Bax or upregulating Bcl-2 mRNA and protein expression levels [ 117].
